view

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends java.lang.Object
    Game view manages the views for the game scene. It manages the player views, the card views, the instructions scene, and the end scene.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameView(int numPlayers)
      Initialises the stage elements.

                           boolean success)

        success - Boolean indicating snap was successful or not

      • moveInstructions

        public void moveInstructions()
        Move instructions scene. Instructions scene can be called and hidden multiple times during game. If it has already been called and hidden and newer nodes have been added to gamepane, they will obscure the instructions. Hence, when it is called we remove and then re-add the scene, to ensure it is the most forward facing node on the gamepane.
